title: Codiad
author: Mitchell Urgero <info@urgero.org>
tagline: Codiad running in a slimmed down version of lamp.cloudron(PHP 7)
postInstallMessage:
After installing, make sure to run the Codiad setup via web browser as well! Once you complete that, add the following line to /app/data/public/config.php if you want Cloudron SSO Authentication:
define("AUTH_PATH", "/app/data/public/ldap.php");
This will allow LDAP (Cloudron) authentication!

SFTP_PORT.title: SFTP Port
SFTP_PORT.description: SFTP Port. Disabling SFTP also disables phpMyAdmin
